subject: Order #SSN2698 - Baseplate received with no screws
description_text:
Hi I ordered the Pro X Ultra Plate with the heel rest. I received the
product, but I did not receive any screws with it. I bought the Simsonn
Plus X which I intend to use with the base plate. Is there a way to get
these screws? or what do you recommend?

thanks

-- 
Christian A. Rivera

conversations.body_text: I received an email asking for a review with pictures? Did you intend to ask for pictures of the package?
I received an email asking for a review with pictures? Did you intend to ask for pictures of the package?

Hi Christian Rivera,    Since our baseplates typically come with all accessories, so we need a photo showing all items included in the baseplate package you recently received. We will then confirm which parts are missing.

Hi Christian Rivera,  Hello, please provide your order number. We’ve just returned to work after the holiday and can arrange to resend the screws tomorrow. Please take a photo of the parts you received — I’ll first verify which components are missing and then arrange the replacement shipment.

Hi.

The order is SSN2698.

I'm attaching pictures of everything I received. I screwed the heel rest
with some leftover screws I have from my rig.

I also would like to note that the plage itself has wear and tear as if
it's been used before.

I also did not receive electric cables for the leds

Let me know if you need anything else.

Thanks

Christian A. Rivera, Esq





On Thu, Oct 9, 2025, 5:05 AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Christian Rivera,      We have noted the wear and tear. We will reship the replacement parts and issue a $20 refund as compensation. We apologize for the inconvenience caused!
Hi Christian Rivera,    Here is your logistics tracking link:  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045968030809

Thank you very much!!

You guys have excellent customer service.

Christian A. Rivera, Esq





On Mon, Oct 13, 2025, 2:41 AM service@simsonn.com
